channel.title: NetBeans News
channel.description: A selection of news highlights from netbeans.org, opensource IDE and application backplane

item.title: Apache NetBeans (incubating) 10 Released
item.description: The Apache NetBeans community is proud to announce the release of Apache NetBeans (incubating) 10.0.

item.title: What's Happened to My Favorite NetBeans Plugins?
item.description: Are you using Apache NetBeans (incubating) 9.0 and wondering where your favorite features are? Read on!

item.title: 1.5M Lines of NetBeans Code from Oracle to Apache
item.description: Oracle donated around 4,000,000 lines of code in the 1st donation last year and has now completed the 2nd donation constituting around 1,500,000 lines of code.
